summary: The "Inspired to Serve Act of 2025" aims to cultivate a culture of service in America. The bill proposes a Civic Education Fund, a Service-Learning Fund, and various programs to integrate military, national, and public service. It establishes a Council on Military, National, and Public Service and an internet-based service platform. The bill includes provisions for youth programs, strengthening national mobilization (including modernizing the Selective Service System), and enhancing opportunities for veterans. Amendments are made to existing laws related to education, national service, and veterans' affairs, with a focus on promoting civic engagement, education, and workforce development across different forms of public service.
